Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Ruthyanne
Reviews.Content: I just received my cam yesterday and I am pleased with the advancement for price. I will update if opinion changes down the room for some reason or another. Packaged well, everything in pic inclu. Case appears durable! Love the dual screen :-) shipping did take a lil longer, but that was due to crazy weather whete it was shipped from. Overall I'd recommend to buy.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 8 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart WiFi Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 1.5-Inch front and 2.7-Inch Rear Dual View LCD Screens (Cobalt Black)
8 Gigabyte MicroSD High Capacity Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Compact Hardshell Digital Camera Carrying Case with Inner Pocket & Neck Strap
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DV150F 16.2MP Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and Dual-View LCD Screens (Cobalt Black) + 7pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
